games.title: Tetris
games.description: Stack falling tetrominoes and clear lines. Speed increases as you score.
games.controls: Arrow keys to move/rotate, Space to hard drop

games.title: Space Invaders
games.description: Defend Earth from descending alien waves.
games.controls: Left/Right to move, Space to fire

games.title: Flappy Bird
games.description: Tap to flap through narrow pipe gaps.
games.controls: Space or Up arrow to flap

games.title: Snake
games.description: Guide the snake to eat food and grow longer.

games.title: Breakout
games.description: Smash rows of colorful bricks with a bouncing ball.

games.title: Pong
games.description: The original arcade classic. Rally the ball past the CPU opponent.

games.title: Asteroids
games.description: Blast rocks in zero gravity. Watch your momentum.
games.controls: Arrow keys to thrust/rotate, Space to fire

games.title: Pac-Man
games.description: Eat all the dots, avoid the ghosts.
